title: Responsive Tourism Website
description: View the complete UX case study on Notion, where I walk through designing this responsive website with integrated mobile travel card functionality.

title: Music Player
description: This browser-based music player was built as a coding challenge using HTML, CSS, and Vanilla JavaScript. It includes essential features like shuffle, repeat, track selection, and volume adjustment. The playlist loads dynamically from JSON data, making it easy to update without code modifications, while CSS Custom Properties allow for flexible styling.

title: Product Viewer Web App
description: Genussmanufaktur patisserie needed a responsive interface that made product exploration intuitive and enjoyable across all devices. I designed keyword search, category filters, and price sorting to help customers find their ideal cake quickly. Features like one-click filter reset and real-time product counts provide instant feedback, while toggle views let users scan multiple products or focus on specific items. The final step involved building this design as a React.js application.
